commits.content:
'use client' import { motion } from 'framer-motion' import { useLanguage } from '@/context/LanguageContext' import { EnvelopeIcon, PhoneIcon, MapPinIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' import { FaLinkedin, FaTwitter, FaInstagram, FaFacebook } from 'react-icons/fa' const contactInfo = { en: { title: 'Contact Us', subtitle: 'Get in touch with us', email: 'info@nbalbadr.com', phone: '+44 123 456 7890', address: '123 Business Street, London, UK', social: 'Follow us on social media', }, ar: { title: 'اتصل بنا', subtitle: 'تواصل معنا', email: 'info@nbalbadr.com', phone: '+44 123 456 7890', address: '123 شارع الأعمال، لندن، المملكة المتحدة', social: 'تابعنا على وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي', } } const socialLinks = [ { icon: FaLinkedin, href: 'https://linkedin.com', label: 'LinkedIn' }, { icon: FaTwitter, href: 'https://twitter.com', label: 'Twitter' }, { icon: FaInstagram, href: 'https://instagram.com', label: 'Instagram' }, { icon: FaFacebook, href: 'https://facebook.com', label: 'Facebook' }, ] export default function Contact() { const { language } = useLanguage() const content = contactInfo[language] return (

{content.title}

{content.subtitle}

{/* Contact Information */}

Email

{content.email}

Phone

{content.phone}

Address

{content.address}

 {/* Social Media */}

{content.social}

{socialLinks.map((social) => ( {social.label} ))}
) }
